This place was awesome! It's tiny so unless you get there before 6:30pm, make a reservation or wait. Went with my husband, our two year old son, our friend and my mom. We ordered nine tapas for all of us. The sangria is very good. The standout food was the Tapas of the Day - flank steak with mushroom sauce (it melts in your mouth), and the eggplant with buffalo mozzarella cheese (like eggplant parm), and the tuna tartar. Would completely recommend going here.
